mixed-citation.article-title: Atlas of European millipedes 3: Order Chordeumatida (Class Diplopoda)

tp:treatment-sec.p: AT, BE, CH , CZ, DE, FR-FRA, GB-GRB, HU, IE, IT-ITA, LU, NL, PL.

A hygrophilous species. Most types of forest and woodland, prefers chalky soils but also on acidic ones, waste ground and maritime habitats, typically in the leaf litter, often on rocky ground. 193â€“2500 m a.s.l. in Switzerland . In Calabria (S Italy ) it is confined to woodland above 1200 m a.s.l.

Most recently recorded from Ireland (University College Dublin campus) by
Gaul & Tighe (2021)
who regarded it likely that this occurrence is due to recent introduction.
